alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Greenville and west central Spartanburg Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 436 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Greenville Downtown, or near Paris Mountain State Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Greer, Mauldin, Taylors, Simpsonville, Berea, Five Forks and Travelers Rest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
